item.title: wp2middleman
item.description: wp2middleman is a Ruby gem that migrates the Wordpress posts in a Wordpress XML export file to middleman-style markdown files. wp2middleman provides a wp2mm commandline executable, as well as a WP2Middleman module. View source and documentation on Github Â»
